ticket.title: [PATCH] Allow MysqlAdapter#config accessible
ticket.original-body:
Found myself wanting to access the config give to the connection adapter outside of a rails project (so config/database.yml wasn't available) - and found myself doing the following:
AcitveRecord::Base.connection.instance_variable_get("@config")
This patch does nothing more than add an attr_reader on config.
If there is a cleaner or better way to do this currently, I'd like to know about it.
